Name: Double Trouble
About the game: Meet Olivia and Elodie, two sisters on an adventure in an infinite imaginary landscape. Can you help them work together in order to discover what secrets are in store? Elodie is tasked with collecting food and luring out animals while Olivia guides animals to farms. Doing so builds up cute little towns as far as the eye can see! Progression system The world starts out simple but soon you'll uncover more types of food, more kinds of animals and who knows what else? Infinite procedural world The world of Double Trouble is carefully procedurally generated with different biomes to unlock and discover. No two game sessions are ever the same! Simple controls, stress-free gameplay Double Trouble is developed for (and tested by!) the youngest of gamers. Simple controls, colorful visuals and stress-free gameplay are sure to keep your little one engaged as they pick up a gamepad/keyboard for the first time!
